items.name: COLUMN_AFTER
desc: A column break is applied after the object to which it belongs.
This implies that the object to which it belongs is the last in its column.

items.name: COLUMN_BEFORE
desc: A column break is applied before the object to which it belongs.
This implies that the object to which it belongs is the first in its column.

items.name: COLUMN_BOTH
desc: A column break is applied before and after the object to which it belongs.
This implies that this object is the only one in its column.

items.name: NONE
desc: No column or page break is applied.
This value specifies that a location is not yet assigned.

items.name: PAGE_AFTER
desc: A page break is applied after the object to which it belongs.
This implies that the object to which it belongs is the last on its page.

items.name: PAGE_BEFORE
desc: A page break is applied before the object to which it belongs.
This implies that the object to which it belongs is the first on its page.

items.name: PAGE_BOTH
desc: A page break is applied before and after the object to which it belongs.
This implies that this object is the only one on its page.
